element.name: tenor
element.documentation: - срок действия - The tenor is the period between the trade date and the delivery date - The tenor is based on the difference between trade and delivery dates

element.name: delivery date
element.documentation: Without considering holidays, we can determine the delivery date by a simple calculation between date and tenor

element.name: value(scenario)
element.documentation: The value of a spot contract is easy to understand because it is simply the result of applying the spot exchange rate in the provided scenario to the amount of the contract

element.name: long
element.documentation: contract can be long (buy) or short (sell).

element.name: option
element.documentation:
We can sell an option to sell money, sell an option to buy money, buy an option to sell money, or buy an option to buy money.
- опцион это как купон на льготную цену - An option gives the buyer the right to buy dollars at a prearranged exchange rate if the holder wishes
- in the money LingvoEconomics - бирж. ситуация, при которой цена использования опциона выгоднее рыночной
prearranged price / назначенная цена

element.name: value(scenario)
element.documentation: - A key feature of the option structure is the polymorphic operation value (Scenario). - technique Black-Scholes analysis

element.name: call [derived]
element.documentation:
- Call and put are terms derived from the longs and shorts.
- A call is an option to buy (that is, a long contract),

element.name: put [derived]
element.documentation: put is an option to sell (a short contract).

element.name: delivery date
element.documentation: Without considering holidays, we can determine the delivery date by a simple calculation between date and tenor

element.name: product
element.documentation: The key difference between a product and a contract is that the product represents the customer's intention while the contract refers to what actually gets traded between the counter and primary parties

element.name: combination product
element.documentation: - combination options can be seen as a composite of other options.

element.name: spread
element.documentation: - spread is two options, but both options are the same direction (that is, two calls or two puts) at different prices.

element.name: delivery date = trade date + tenor + next working day
long option + long contract or short option + short contract
long option + short contract or short option + long contract
strike prices of legs are the same
2 legs: 1 long 1 short, of wich 1 call, 1 put
2 legs: 1 call 1 put, both long OR both short
all legs calls OR all legs puts
2 legs, both puts with same expiry
2 legs, both calls with same expiry

node.label: - forward contracts - Delivery usually occurs in a couple of months
- An option gives the buyer the right to buy dollars at a prearranged exchange rate if the holder wishes
- combination options can be seen as a composite of other options.
A barrier option can either appear or disappear when the price of the instrument, as quoted on some agreed market pricing (such as a Reuters page), reaches a particular limit.
example, a report containing a list of contracts
